description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk
Made with coffee, whiskey, and Irish cream!
Mascarpone and espresso ice cream with ladyfingers mixed in. (Contains alcohol)
We make whole key lime pies, then chop them up and mix the pieces into a key lime ice cream base. Wow!
A vanilla cake flavored ice cream with loads of rainbow sprinkles and pieces of gluten-free yellow cake
Our (coconut-based) vegan chocolate flavor, with ancho chile, cinnamon, and cayenne pepper.
Our coconut milk ice cream base blended with Japanese black sesame paste.
Guanábana a/k/a Soursop, a tropical fruit, makes for a super refreshing sorbet
